shortDescription: In 1975, a filmmaker agrees to collaborate on a film with a gangster who wishes to    become a famous actor.
p1: 1973 Kombai Village Forest: A despicable DSP Rathna Kumar is assigned to nab the notorious elephant poacher, Shettani. The police torture the local tribals about Shettani's whereabouts, even though  they themselves are Shettani's victims.
p2: 1973 Madras: Kirubakaran is selected for the post of SI in the Tamil Nadu Police. He goes to his    fiancé, Lourde's college, to convey the news and watch her performance at the college culturals.    While he's talking with her, they observe a group of students fighting amongst themselves. Lourde    challenges Kirubakaran to stop them fighting, to which he replies that he will do that only after he    gets his police uniform. But, he goes ahead and tries to stop them anyway. Some time later, 4 of the   students are shown to be murdered by Kirubakaran, who seemingly faints at the sight of blood, but   has the weapon in his hand. He is then sentenced to prison.
p3: 1975 Madurai: Rathna Kumar's elder brother, Jeyakodi, is a film star and rising politician of the ruling party, who is ambitious and desires to be the next Chief minister. However,he is distressed    about his film screenings being halted in Coimbatore,Ramnad,Madurai and Tirunelveli by the    supporters of his fellow party member and rival Karmegam. Alliyus Caesar, a notorious gangster and    head of the Jigarthanda Sambhavam Fans Club is Karmegam's supporter at Madurai. Jeyakodi requests    Rathna to kill Alliyus and the 3 other gangsters who are supporting Karmegam's political ambitions,    so that he can make the latter less influential within the party. Rathna selects Kirubakaran, along    with three other ex-cop prisoners, to send them as moles and assigns each of them a single target,    with Kirubakaran's target being Alliyus. Rathna promises that all four of them will be acquitted and    resumed to their duties if they succeed in their respective mission.
p4: Alliyus invites the other 3 gangsters and Karmegam for his wife, Malaiyarasi's baby shower. One of    the targets in the police' hitlist is successfully killed by one of the moles. This raises suspicion    and Alliyus finds and kills all of the moles, except Kirubakaran, as the latter is unsuspected. He   also learns that Alliyus ordered the hit on the 4 college students, for which he was made a    scapegoat. This revelation hardens his determination to pursue vengeance against Alliyus. He wants    Alliyus to be killed by Shettani, and hence asks him to visit his ancestral village and nab Shettani    with the pretext that his adventure against Shettani will make a better biopic. Alliyus unwittingly    agrees and visits the village and makes a deal with Rathna that he would nab Shettani in exchange of releasing the tribal members, to which the latter agrees.
